text: BSP chief Mayawati on Tuesday demanded the immediate resignation of Union Minister Ram Shankar Katheria for his alleged inflammatory remarks against Muslims at a condolence meeting for a VHP worker in Agra last week. At the meeting held on Sunday, VHP and BJP leaders allegedly made violent references to Muslims and urged Hindus to prepare for a ‘final battle’ in 2017. — Omar Rashid
title: Minister must go: Mayawati
